timeline.bodyText:
a customization allows to make "bold label" on all conditional styles without having to do all combinatory.
i have added a customisation per diagram but we can create a global one on common.odesign for all breakdown. for instance, a new diagram "Common > Common Description" containing these common things, with no possibility to create such diagram.
idk, wdyt?
timeline.author: pdulth
